nodes.text: The Lengilese were a lost civilization considered to be ancient by the Imperial Era. The Shadow University had a collection of Lengilese artifacts, as did Ronen Tagge of the Tagge family. When attempting to get information from the crime boss Lady Proxima regarding the Path engine that had been sold to Beol De'Rruyet on the planet Corellia, the rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra painted detonite rings and claimed they were Lengilese life-fasting bracelets, offering one to Proxima as a token of her esteem.
